lead_paragraph: In the East End of London, fourteen-year old Montana discovers that his employer -- a powerful crime lord  -- secretly killed his father. At the same time, former Serbian commando Dimitrije comes for the gangster who killed his wife and son. Realizing they are both bent on lethal revenge, the commando mentors the boy in the dark arts of assassination, while re-learning the value of life as he teaches the boy the meaning of friendship, honor and respect.
